General.Name: Delong Composite Energy Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Delong Composite Energy Group Co., Ltd. engages in the supply and distribution of natural gas through pipelines for urban residents, commercial users, and industrial users in China. The company is involved in the natural gas transportation; construction and management of various gas pipeline networks; city gas operation and sales; investment and operation of vehicle refueling stations; CNG/LNG supply; and development and construction of comprehensive energy utilization projects. It also operates hotels; and provides engineering management; property leasing; property management; and energy utilization project energy-saving services. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Datong Gas Development Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Delong Composite Energy Group Co., Ltd. in February 2022. Delong Composite Energy Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No. 55, Sichuan Road Construction, Chengdu, China, 610051
